item.title: Trump, Putin to talk as Ukraine and Europe push for immediate ceasefire
item.description: European leaders spoke with President Donald Trump on Sunday to urge him to pressure Vladimir Putin to agree to a 30-day ceasefire in Ukraine.

item.title: Netanyahu says he will allow ‘minimal’ aid into Gaza to preserve U.S. support
Live updates: Trump speaking with Putin, Zelensky in separate calls as he seeks end to war
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s return to the White House and the Republican-led Congress.

item.title: Diddy trial live updates: Dawn Richard’s testimony cross-examined in Sean Combs’s sex-trafficking case
item.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs’s federal sex-trafficking trial continues on Day 6, with former Danity Kane singer Dawn Richard expected to testify.
